verbs.description: Amid fierce political debate over a Trump administration policy that [V: has] separated immigrant children from their parents , Meghan McCain called out President Donald Trump 's daughter and adviser , Ivanka Trump , for her silence on the issue .

Amid fierce political debate over [ARG0: a Trump administration policy] [R-ARG0: that] has [V: separated] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] , Meghan McCain called out President Donald Trump 's daughter and adviser , Ivanka Trump , for her silence on the issue .
